name: Starch Trek: Deep Spud Nine
description:
Controls:
A/D Left/Right Arrow: Run
Spacebar: Jump (Costs 0.2 Seconds of time)
Left Click: Dig (Costs 0.1 Seconds of time)
Right Click: Super Jump (Costs 3 seconds of time
R Key x3: Reset the Game

Spacebar:  Move to next screen on Title Screen, Victory Screen, and Game Over screen.

Objective: 
Collect enough potatoes and return to your Space House before the timer runs out.

Story: 
Join Captain James Tuberius Kirk on his quest to dig where no man has dug before and gather potatoes to tide him over during Space Winter.  Continue your journey to the end to get sweet, sweet potato facts.

Items:
Potato: increase potatoes
Golden Potato: increase potatoes by a lot and give special effects
Clock: Increases time
Portals: Teleport to new locations and lands
Note: There are others. Find out for yourself!

Tip:
The game can be completed by itself with no tricks, but there are some hidden strategies.  Ways to dig multiple blocks both horizontally and vertically for example (although you only have the ability to dig straight down).

Tip:
Spud Jr. Mode gives you 999 seconds to explore, but you can't get credit for finding Golden Potatoes.

Checklist:
Find all 12 Golden Potatoes
Find 4 or more endings
Find 1 secret level
Find 3 different types of portals (there are many portals in the game, but there are 3 types)

Credits: 
Character Art and Block Art: Caiden Curry. Check out his other art here: https://www.artstation.com/caidencurry
Programming, Concept, Design:  GrayHato
Additional Credits Coming soon.
